# Disemboweling Tusks
## Overview
*Disemboweling Tusks:* While raging, when you confirm a critical hit with your gore attack, you deal 1d4 points of Constitution damage in addition to the normal damage for the gore attack. You must be at least 10th level to select this rage power.

**Source:** Blood of the Moon, pg. 13
